transcript:
[ Ringing]
Hello.
Hello.
Ji
Techno service se baat kar rahe hain mam.
Han ji.
Mam main India mart se baat kar raha hun mam.
Ji. Ye aapka Tannu ke sath conversation hua tha mam.
Vijay sir baat kar rahe ho na aap.
Han han Vijay bol raha hun mam.
Han bolo na. Main aapko karti hun panch minute dijiye na mujhe main call karti hun. 
Paanch minute mein. Theek hai theek hai theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Request to call back in five minutes.



Resolution:

- Agreed to call back in five minutes.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer will call back in five minutes.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral.



@@@Key Topics:

call, india mart, tannu, vijay
